Rich Moore (story), Phil Johnston (story), Jim Reardon (story), Phil Johnston (screenplay), Jennifer Lee (screenplay), John C. Reilly (additional story material)
John C. Reilly, Sarah Silverman, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch

"Wreck-It Ralph longs to be as beloved as his game's perfect Good Guy, Fix-It Felix. Problem is, nobody loves a Bad Guy. But they do love heroes... so when a modern, first-person shooter game arrives featuring tough-as-nails Sergeant Calhoun, Ralph sees it as his ticket to heroism and happiness. He sneaks into the game with a simple plan -- win a medal -- but soon wrecks everything, and accidentally unleashes a deadly enemy that threatens every game in the arcade. Ralph's only hope?"
